mapper.insert: insert into scrap_city values(null, str_to_date(#{dateFrom}, '%c/%e/%Y'), str_to_date(#{dateTo},'%c/%e/%Y') , now(), #{usrSeq}, #{ctySeq})
mapper.update: update scrap_city set date_from = str_to_date(#{dateFrom}, '%c/%e/%Y'), date_to = str_to_date(#{dateTo},'%c/%e/%Y') where cty_seq=#{ctySeq} and usr_seq=#{usrSeq}
mapper.select: select date_from as dateFrom, date_to as dateTo, cty_seq as ctySeq from scrap_city where usr_seq=#{usrSeq} and cty_seq=#{ctySeq}
